about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm an Application Engineer with a passion for software analysis and cybersecurity. With experience in oil field IT infrastructure and software solutions, I bring a unique blend of technical expertise and problem-solving skills to every project.

experience.description: Managing and supporting enterprise applications in a critical oil field environment. Responsible for application deployment, troubleshooting, and optimization.
Provided application engineering support and contributed to IT infrastructure improvements.
Managed telecommunications systems and network infrastructure in an industrial environment.
Provided comprehensive IT support and software solutions for diverse client needs.
